analysis.description:
Reentrancy in SysEscrow.cancelEscrow (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#84-114):
	External calls:
	- buyerReceivedMoney = escrows[_tradeHash].buyer.call.value(buyerValue)() (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#99-101)
	- arbitratorReceivedMoney = arbitrator.call.value(arbitratorValue)() (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#101-103)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- escrows (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#110-112)

Reentrancy in SysEscrow.releaseEscrow (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#130-160):
	External calls:
	- sellerReceivedMoney = escrows[_tradeHash].seller.call.value(buyerValue)() (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#145-147)
	- arbitratorReceivedMoney = arbitrator.call.value(arbitratorValue)() (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#148-151)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- escrows (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#159)

SysEscrow.approveEscrow (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#114-130) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(escrows[_tradeHash].buyer == msg.sender)
SysEscrow.MinDeposit should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#9)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#114:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#160:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
SysEscrow.setArbitrator (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#65-73) should be declared external
SysEscrow.isExistsEscrow (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#161-168) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#1): it allows old versions

Low level call in SysEscrow.cancelEscrow (/unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#84-114):
	-buyerReceivedMoney = escrows[_tradeHash].buyer.call.value(buyerValue)() /unique_chucks/33/0x903643251af408a3c5269c836b9a2a4a1f04d1cf.sol#99-101
